name: lspssv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: syl(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clss, c0)))
stmt.pretty: syl((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` c1)⊆ c2, (c3 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clss, c0)))

stmt.origin: lspcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(clss, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clss, c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(clss, c0), cfv(clss, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (LSubSp ` c0)=(LSubSp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)

cumulated.origin:

⊣ ((c3 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c0)→(c3 ` c1)⊆ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (LSubSp ` c0)=(LSubSp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)
